text.jpText: 前回のオグリキャップに次いで、優駿たちが新たな伝説を築くべく\n『有馬記念』に挑みます
text.enText: Following the success of Oguri Cap last\ntime, these heroes will take on the Arima\nKinen to create a new legend!

text.jpText: 先頭でゴールを駆け抜けるのは1番人気のメジロマックイーンか？\nそれとも歴戦のライバルたちか？
text.enText: Who will take the lead at the finish line,\nthe most popular horse in the field,\nMedillomacQueen? Or will it be her rivals?

text.jpText: 今、大歓声を噛みしめるように、\nウマ娘たちが力強くスタンド前を駆け抜けていきます！
text.enText: Now, as if biting into the loud cheers,\nthe Uma Musume are powerfully running\nthrough the stands!

text.jpText: 歓声が……皆さんの応援が、\n私をまた一歩前へと押してくれますわ
text.enText: Your cheers… and your support will\npush me forward another step.

text.jpText: 本当にいい走りだね、マックイーン、\n春の『天皇賞』の時と同じ……ううん、それ以上かも
text.enText:
You're running really well, McQueen.
You're running just as well as you did at
the Tennoushou in the spring… Or
maybe even better.

text.jpText: 調子はずっと変わってません……\nただ、皆さんの期待と歯車が噛み合わなかっただけ
text.enText: The tone hasn't changed for a long time.\n… It's just that the gears didn't\nmesh with your expectations.

text.jpText: 各ウマ娘、第4コーナーを回って最後の直線へ入っていきます！\nグランプリの栄光はもう目の前だ！　残り300m！
text.enText:
Each horse girl, rounding the fourth
corner and entering the final straight!
The glory of the Grand Prix is at
hand! 300 meters to go!

text.jpText: しっかり噛み合った今の私なら、きっと！
text.enText: Now that I'm firmly engaged,\nI'm sure I will!

text.jpText: ここでメジロマックイーンがラストスパート！\n前との距離が一気に縮まるっ！
text.enText: Here comes the last spurt of the race for\nMegillomacQueen! The distance to the front\nis closing fast!

text.jpText: 3番手、2番手！\nやはり現役最強ウマ娘はメジロマックイーンか！？
text.enText: Third place, second place! After all, the\nstrongest horse girl in the field is\nprobably MegilomacQueen!

text.jpText: しかし内からも1人、すごい末脚で上がってくる！\nこれはどうなる！？　2人とも全く譲らない！　勝者はどっちだ！？
text.enText:
But there's also one from the inside,
coming up with an amazing endurance!
What's going to happen now? Neither
of them will give up at all! Who will
be the winner?
